attributes.title: BEWARE IT GAVE ME CHLAMYDIA
attributes.review: this app seemed to have given me a virus. and the next day i was feeling off. i soon found out i had been diagnosed with CHLAMYDIA!!!👿👿👿never get this app unless you wanna have stds and constantly be burning and itching!!!

attributes.title: this caused my depression
attributes.review: THIS APP IS THE REASON I HAVE BI-POLAR DEPRESSION. when you open the app you are greeted with an AWFUL picture of an orange! WHAT??!!! not to mention it was hairy!!! now i was eating chimy chongas and it made me lose my appetite. do not get this app! DO NOT GET THIS APP!! THIS APP CAUSED MY DEPRESSION!!! 👨‍❤️‍💋‍👨👨‍❤️‍💋‍👨👩‍❤️‍💋‍👩👩‍❤️‍💋‍👩🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈

attributes.title: Eww🐮
attributes.review: Then i was downloading the app it took so long when I open the app my phone broke because trumps face came out then trump talks to much and it made my ears bleed my just listened to him 🤬🤮🤢🤖💩👺🤡😷🥴🖕

attributes.title: Such bad app 🤮🤮
attributes.review: It didnt let me do anything and messed up my credit card info bady! It made my phone shut off multiple times!!!

attributes.title: Don’t download
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see what the news was and let me tell you I lagged almost every second I did anything to think they have a virus DONT DOWNLOAD!!!!

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: After waiting until I had my first child for this app to actually download. I have realized that this app is terrible. It has an appalling man as the very first image, which I’m very sure gave me PTSD. PLEASE DON’T DOWNLOAD IF YOU ARE SENSITIVE TO CHEETO PUFFS.

attributes.title: Caused my phone to restart!
attributes.review: This app deleted all my info off my phone! All my photos, contacts, texts, apps are all gone! Do not download this app! It is a scam!

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: This app is dangerous. Not only to America but to the health and safety of our children. I downloaded this app thinking it would be a fun app about clowns for my children but I was wrong.

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: Absolutely terrible! The app takes the info you give them and uses to put tabs on people.

attributes.title: Don’t download
attributes.review: THIS APP IS TERRIBLE!!!, it is a very creepy app and I regret downloading it, I’d suggest deleting the app right now because trust me you aren’t going to like it, if I could give it zero stars I would.
